doc:
Spencer Bell (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spencer_Bell_(actor) 0 Spencer Bell (September 25, 1887 – August 18, 1935) was an American stage and film actor, best known for playing opposite Larry Semon in many of his silent comedy shorts from the late 1910s to 1928. Bell was one of the first African American comedic actors of the silent film era, and was the first to be signed to film contract. Over the course of his fifteen year film career, Bell appeared in more than seventy comedy shorts. Spencer_Bell ( September_25_,_1887 – August_18_,_1935 ) was an_American_stage_and_film_actor , best_known for playing opposite_Larry_Semon in many of his_silent_comedy_shorts from the_late_1910s to 1928 . Bell was one of the_first_African_American_comedic_actors of the_silent_film_era , and was the_first to_be_signed to film_contract . Over the_course of his_fifteen_year_film_career , Bell appeared in more_than_seventy_comedy_shorts .
